properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 9:40PM EST until January 16 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Chattahoochee River near Columbus affecting Lee...Russell...
Chattahoochee and Muscogee Counties

Flint River near Griffin Hwy. 16 affecting Fayette and Spalding
Counties

YellowJacket Creek near Hogansville affecting Troup County

Line Creek near Senoia affecting Coweta...Fayette and Spalding
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Flint River near Griffin Hwy. 16.
* Until Thursday morning.
* At 930 PM Tuesday the stage was 13.6 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is occurring, and minor flooding is forecast to
continue.
* Flood stage is 12 feet.
* The river will continue rising, reaching near 13.7 feet after
midnight Wednesday morning. The river is forecast to fall below
flood stage early Thursday morning.
* Between 13 and 14 feet, minor flooding continues in the woodlands,
fields and pastures upstream and downstream from the gage on
Georgia Highway 16, or Newnan Road. The backyards of homes at the
end of Landing Way, upstream from the bridge, will be flooded with
around a foot of water.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Thursday morning
